description: I. A review of the failure of the Immigration & Nationality Directorate to consider some foreign national prisoners for deportation. 34 p. II. Letter dated 14/06/2007 from Lin Homer, Chief Executive of IND, to John Denham MP regarding reform of the deportation system. III. Border & Immigration Agency business plan for transition year 2007-2008. 48 p. IV. Table showing action plan on the Hyde report. 6 p.
